divs: sighting detailsit was a cold and overcast day . nov.21, 2007 at 1:50 pm . i was returning home from deer hunting in the pierre-marquette forest. while traveling n. on 140th ave. approximately 1\4 mil before reaching 19 mile road. i had just crested a hill in an open area of hay fields, when i noticed directly in front of me and about a mile away, what could best be described as a huge strangely illuminated ,glowing, triangular object in the sky just below the cloud ceiling. the outer perimeters of which appeared to be illuminated (mixture of pale, satiny white, greyish white, ) with the center of the object semi transparent and the same color as the sky. it actually looked like the sky was in the center of the triangle somehow. (like a glowing pool ball rack) the object was moving from west to east, and was only visible for a few seconds . i had to accelerate to get past a tree line in hopes of catching a glimpse of it again. i turned east onto 19 mile road and did not view it again until i reached an area of open power lines. at which time i only caught a glimpse of it . i first overshot the power lines and had to brake and reverse to catch a fleeting glimpse as the rearmost section of the craft was swallowed up by the clouds. i could not hear any sounds but my truck was running at the time. i was shocked by the size of this object and my first thought was of possibly some sort of object crashing into the earth. but quickly realized it was on a level trajectory and appeared to be under power. i must admit i was quite shocked and upset by what i had seen and tried to notify someone but kept getting recordings etc. so my brother who also had a sighting many years ago suggested i notify mufon while it was still fresh in my memory.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Le Roy
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: I observed a huge glowing triangle in the sky below the cloud ceiling.
